title: TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree for Indoor Kitten Small Cats with Green Leaves, Cozy Plush Indoor Plant Design Cat House Cute Cat Condo Cat Scratching Posts with Hang Ball, Green Pet Home Cat Furniture
descriptions:
**Advertising Description:**

Upgrade your feline friend's living space with the TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree! This stunning 2-in-1 cat condo and scratching post boasts a sleek design, making it an essential addition to any modern home. Crafted with 600g skin friendly plush and a soft carpet base, this cozy cat house is not only visually appealing but also provides ultimate comfort for your beloved pet.

The TSCOMON Cat House Cat Tree offers unparalleled stability, featuring a safe and tip-resistant base to ensure your cat has a secure and wobble-free play area. Integrate this beautiful cat tree into your home decor with its leaves design that serves as family greenery, making it a functional addition to any room.

Functionality meets fun in the TSCOMON Cat House Cat Tree! This versatile cat furniture provides rest space for kittens or one medium-sized cat and comes equipped with a scratching post made of sisal material, ensuring your cat's claws stay sharp while keeping their furniture intact.

Assembly is a breeze with this easy-to-assemble cat tree, requiring just 1 to 8 minutes to complete. Plus, our attentive customer service team is dedicated to providing you with quality products and ensuring your satisfaction. The TSCOMON Cat House Cat Tree comes in three stylish colors: Grey, Beige, or Green, and weighs only 6 Pounds for easy transport and placement.

Don't miss out on this must-have cat furniture for your furry companion! Before making a purchase, please check the dimensions to ensure proper size and consider placing it on a flat floor against the wall for optimal stability. Remember, children should not be allowed to play with the cat tree. Order now and watch your cat thrive in their new TSCOMON Cat House Cat Tree!

Introducing the TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree - a 2-in-1 masterpiece designed for your beloved feline friend! Crafted with a plush, skin-friendly surface and a stable, soft carpet base, this cat condo is both safe and stylish.

The integration of a leaves design not only adds an elegant touch to your home but also serves as a charming family greenery. Your kitten or small to medium-sized cat will find endless play opportunities with the included hang ball and scratching post made from durable sisal material.

Assembly is effortless, taking just 1 to 8 minutes to complete. Our attentive customer service team ensures your satisfaction is our top priority, providing quality products and readily available assistance.

Measuring 11" x 15" x 41", this cat house features three color options: Grey, Beige, or Green. With a weight of only 6 Pounds, it's easy to move around for your cat's convenience. Don't miss out on this irresistible cat furniture, but please remember to check the size before buying and ensure proper placement on a flat floor against the wall for optimal stability.

Warning: Not intended for children's use.

Setting up this beautiful creation is a breeze, taking only 1 to 8 minutes to assemble, and includes all necessary tools. Customer satisfaction is our top priority, and we stand by our commitment to providing you with quality products and attentive service.

Available in Grey, Beige, or Green color options, the TSCOMON Cat Tree comes with a weight of 6 Pounds and a package that includes the cat tree, assembly instruction, and set of tools. Before making your purchase, kindly check the size and ensure proper placement on a flat floor against the wall for added stability. Remember, this is not intended for children's play.

Experience unparalleled joy as you watch your beloved feline companion thrive in their new TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree. Order yours today!

Introducing the TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree, a 2-in-1 masterpiece designed for your feline friend's rest and playtime needs! This high-quality cat condo and sisal scratching post is crafted with a 600g skin friendly plush material and a soft carpet base, ensuring both comfort and stability.

Transform your living space into a cozy haven for your kitten or one medium cat, as this cat tree seamlessly integrates with home décor through its stylish leaves design. The safe and stable base is designed to resist tipping and wobbling, providing peace of mind for both you and your pet.

Functionality meets form in the TSCOMON Cat House Cat Tree – not only does it serve as a restful space, but it also includes a scratching post made from durable sisal material. Your cat can unwind in style while keeping their claws sharp on this versatile and functional piece of furniture.

Assembly is a breeze with easy-to-follow instructions and all necessary tools included, allowing you to have your cat's new home up and running within just 1 to 8 minutes. Our attentive customer service team is committed to ensuring your satisfaction – we go the extra mile to provide quality products and quick responses should any questions or concerns arise.

The TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree measures 11 inches x 15 inches x 41 inches, comes in Grey, Beige, and Green color options, and weighs a manageable 6 Pounds. Additionally, place the tree on a flat floor against the wall for optimal stability, and do not allow children to play with it for their safety. Treat your beloved feline companion to the ultimate cat furniture experience – order now!
